feed.title: Sri Lanka Backpacking
feed.subtitle: Sri Lanka Backpacking. This is a personal blog. Max and Henriette travelling in Sri Lanka februar 24th till march 16th.

entry.title: Comming Soon
entry.content:
Eight weeks from now we will sit on our flight to Sri Lanka on 25th of Februar. The flight goes from Frankfurt (FRA) to Colombo Bandaranayike (CMB) and will land there on Monday the 26th at 4:35 am local time. We will directly continue to the highlands, taking the train from Colombo Fort railway station.

So that’s what’s planned for now, let’s see what happens, cheers ..
entry.summary: Eight weeks from now we will sit on our flight to Sri Lanka on 25th of Februar. The flight goes from Frankfurt (FRA) to Colombo Bandaranayike (CMB) and will land there on Monday the 26th at 4:35 am local time. We will directly continue to the highlands, taking the train from Colombo Fort railway station.
